column4: Guys I've been using RhythmBox for my music/media and I'm not too happy with it. IS there anything else I can use? Not Amarok either, thought it was pretty buggy...
I'll look Banshee up. Reddit.com/r/Ubuntu seems to be a big fan of Clementine
Haven't heard of that one before
I personally believe that Banshee is the best media application in my experience.
